Job Title: Application Scientist, FT-NMR Benchtop

Location: Billerica, MA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Analyst, Information Technology, Research

Description:
Creating and maintaining dedicated benchtop NMR user documentation, training material, protocols, workflows, and optimized application sequences, including transfer and optimization of existing (high field) NMR methods to low field.  Performing or assisting in customer training and support (on-site, in house and virtual/ remote) to familiarize customers with product usage.  Performing or assisting sales team with benchtop NMR spectrometer demonstrations (on-site, in house and virtual/ remote).  Generating customized customer reports and presentations of results and analyses as required.  Troubleshooting and routine maintenance of demo lab instruments.  Representation of the company and promotion of the benchtop NMR portfolio at conferences, trade-shows, seminars, and webinars, including preparation of presentations and posters as required.  Performing and assisting in the production of marketing and sales materials. Creating videos, virtual lectures, and other documentation.  Scientific and technical support of Sales and After Sales teams.  Supporting Product Management with customer requirement specification and product validation during Product Lifecycle Management and customer feedback for products and solutions already available on the market.  Participating in the development of new methods. Collaboration on customer projects (publication opportunities exist).  Keeping up to date with the latest knowledge applicable to high and low field NMR spectroscopy.  Collaborating with the global expansion team as well as other stakeholders (e.g. Product Managers, R&D, Sales). 

Qualifications

 MS or PhD in natural sciences, preferably chemistry, biochemistry, or chemical engineering  1-5 years experience in the operation of NMR spectrometers, benchtop NMR preferred , f amiliarity with NMR data analysis is a plus  Valid Driver License in good standing, issued by resident state required  S. Citizenship or U.S. Permanent Resident status required  Maintenance of a valid passport with flexibility for global travel  May be required to pass security clearance investigation  Intermediate knowledge of chemical concepts with specialization in one or more areas such as organic, inorganic, analytical or physical chemistry or biochemistry  Strong verbal, written, computer, interpersonal, communication, teaching, and presentation skills with ability to write at an advanced scientific level and deliver customer-oriented support  Demonstrated efficiency in Microsoft Windows operating systems with advanced capabilities with MS Office programs such as MS Word, Excel, and MS PowerPoint. 

Bruker Corporation offers a comprehensive and competitive benefits package including medical, dental, 401(k), paid vacation, holidays, and tuition assistance.

Bruker is a federal contractor and subject to Executive Order 14042. Under Executive Order 14042, all employees must be fully vaccinated against COVID-19 (with limited exceptions for those employees who are unable to be vaccinated due to a medical condition or a sincerely held religious belief). You will need to provide proof of vaccination by submitting a copy of your CDC COVID-19 Vaccination Record Card to Bruker, or obtain a religious or medical exemption, as a condition of employment.

Bruker is an equal opportunity employer. We evaluate qualified applicants without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, veteran status, and other protected characteristics.

Certain positions at Bruker require compliance with export control laws and as a result, all interviewed candidates for all positions will be screened pre-interview to determine their eligibility in light of export control restrictions.

Our high-performance products and high-value life science and diagnostics solutions are trusted by leading businesses, institutes, and scientists worldwide. Today, more than 8.500 employees at over 90 locations are working on this permanent challenge to make the world a better place.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
